itemDescription: Scottish conservationist, writer, and wildlife photographer (1937-2015)

wikipedia_page.main: Richard Balharry  (3 September 1937 – 22 April 2015) was a Scottish conservationist, writer, and wildlife photographer.

response: *2015 – Dick Balharry, Scottish environmentalist and photographer (b. 1937)
* 2004 Lifetime Achievement Award of the John Muir Trust, for conserving wild places – presented by Dick Balharry
*Dick Balharry, 77, British conservationist, cancer.Renowned conservationist Dick Balharry dies after receiving award
*Dick Balharry (1937–2015), Scottish conservationist, writer, and wildlife photographer
